title: Jeff Glucker of HOONIVERSE!
description:
Jeff Glucker is back! One of the oldest, funniest, and most frequent guests, he's the host of The Hooniverse Podcast and YouTube channel. He drives lots of new cool things and has had some hilarious (and not so hilarious) project woes. Some involve HEMIs, and Mercedes. It wasn't good. He's here to talk about it all. 

READ: www.hooniverse.com

WATCH: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheHooniverse

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/Z5fREp7M9bc

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @hooniversejeff

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
